snippet.title: TerraScape Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
Mark your calendars, because TerraScape 1.0 is ready to launch with the final content update on the 17th of July! We're SO excited! 🎉

One of the greatest and most nerve-wracking moments in making a video game is the release of the game itself.

Our cozy city-puzzler TerraScape has been in Early Access for about a year now. Since then, we've added a lot of additional content and frequent updates, as well as fixing a number of issues that you, the community, have pointed out.

And now, in less than a month, the game will finally see its long-awaited 1.0 release! We can't wait for you to play the full version of TerraScape on July 17.

Let us know if you've already played TerraScape, or if you're waiting for the full release!

Either way, we hope you have a great time playing ❤️
Bitfall Team

#IndieGame #IndieGameDev
